price: 48. Ir jie sako: „Kada šis pažadas (t. y. Prikėlimas) bus išpildytas, jei jūs esate tiesą sakantys?“
arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا ٱلۡوَعۡدُ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlūna matā hādhā al-waʿdu in kuntum ṣādiqīna
